mapper.select: select id, payment_date as paymentDate, receipt_no as receiptNo, amount from payment where billing = #{billingId}
mapper.insert: insert into payment(member, billing, amount, payment_date, receipt_no, billing_period, payment_type, other) values (#{memberId}, #{billingId}, #{amount}, #{paymentDate}, #{receiptNo}, #{billingPeriod}, #{paymentType}, #{other})
mapper.update: update payment set member = #{memberId}, billing = #{billingId}, amount = #{amount}, payment_date = #{paymentDate}, receipt_no = #{receiptNo}, payment_type = #{paymentType} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT lname, fname, payment.id, member, payment_type as paymentType, receipt_no, payment.PAYMENT_DATE as paymentDate, amount, payment.billing_period FROM payment LEFT OUTER JOIN member ON payment.member = member.id WHERE payment.billing_period = #{periodId}
